strings.description.discord.commands.bancommand: Bans the user from your current server
strings.discord.commands.bancommand.success.embe: The user, ${user}, has been banned from **${guild}** for **${reason}**.
strings.discord.commands.bancommand.error.unspec: The user you provided was invalid! Please specify a valid user/ID.
strings.discord.commands.bancommand.error.proble: An error occurred when using this command.
strings.discord.commands.bancommand.error.rateli: You're currently on cooldown! You have **${seconds}** left before you can use another command.
strings.discord.commands.bancommand.error.alread: This user has already been banned!
strings.discord.commands.bancommand.error.botmis: I am missing the `BAN_PERMISSION` permission. Please turn that on so I can ban said person.
strings.discord.commands.bancommand.error.usermi: You are missing the `BAN_PERMISSION` permission. Please have the required permission so you can ban that person.
strings.discord.commands.bamcommand.dmuser.embed: You have been banned from **${guild}** for **${reason}**.
